code: export default function validateInfo(values){var errors={};if(!values.first_name.trim()){errors.first_name='First Name required';}else if(!/^[A-Za-z]+/.test(values.first_name.trim())){errors.first_name='Enter a valid First Name';}if(!values.last_name.trim()){errors.last_name='Last Name required';}else if(!/^[A-Za-z]+/.test(values.last_name.trim())){errors.last_name='Enter a valid Last Name';}if(!values.email.trim()){errors.email='Email required';}else if(!/\S+@\S+\.\S+/.test(values.email)){errors.email='Email address is invalid';}return errors;}
